lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors play Dungeons and Dragons and occasionally leave sobbing messes. Tonight's going to be a very interesting episode. Before we get into that, let's go ahead and coast through our announcements so we can get to the actual game at hand. First and foremost, we want to thank our sponsor for many weeks still going, Loot Crate!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Loot Crate!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you so much. Sam, did you have something prepared?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The next morning, she woke up. Her roommate, the skin had been ripped off of her body, and the cat that they shared had also been turned essentially inside out. And on the wall in the blood of her roommate was written: Use code criticalrole for $3 off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a lot of blood.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a lot of blood, and it's a lot of savings for the new Loot Crate, whose theme is horror. Channel your best Final Girl with items from The Walking Dead, Nightmare on Elm Street, Friday the 13th, Texas Chainsaw Massacre, Halloween, and the story I just told. Hey, should we open them up, guys?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! Now, I think this is September's theme.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is definitely horror. Let's open them and see what horror items we have?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whoa, look at this scary car!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look at this scary keychain of Batman!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scary Stark Industries.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stark Motor Racing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The scariest Stark Industries.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Look, it's Dark Knight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's Gone in Sixty Seconds.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nicolas Cage was scary in Gone in Sixty Seconds, just throwing it out there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I forgot he was in that movie.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ashley, do you want this?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's the pin? The pin says Loot Year. Oh, it's like Goodyear.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is this really a hood ornament?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's pretty sick.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go online, go to lootcrate.com/criticalrole. Sign up, get subscriptions for all of your friends and all of your dead friends who died tragically in a horror.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter) In a horror.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I used to break those off of the front of people's cars when I was a kid because I was an asshole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you were. (laughs) Great! Thank you, Sam. Next up on the list, I will actually be down in San Diego tomorrow for the first day of TwitchCon. I have a panel in room FrankerZ. It's at 6:30 to 7:30pm about GMing roleplaying games on Twitch. It's going to be me, Adam Koebel, Chris Perkins, a bunch of great people that run a lot of great RPG programming on Twitch. We're going to be talking about our experiences running it, answering questions, all that fun stuff, so if you're already down there or you're in the San Diego area, come tomorrow and say hi at the panel at 6:30. It'll be awesome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, totally. No, never. 6:30pm in FrankerZ, I think is the room, unless I'm reading the emails wrong. That's the only room information I was given. FrankerZ is the guy who's sending me the emails.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (stage whispering) They're our fucking sponsors! Leave the box on the goddamn table!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway, speaking of fun news, Laura, you wanted to mention something about some things up on the store?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, this is exciting!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it about your friend who went to college?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Her face was ripped off, but when her body was discovered, she was wearing one of these How Do You Want to Do This? hoodies. These sweatshirts that have been available before and then we took them away. But guess what, guys? They're back!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We made more!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For two weeks of preorder, you can get these comfy, cozy hoodies.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is that voice you're doing? (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's other things in the store too, like our beautiful mug that I don't have on the table today that Ashley used in Blindspot!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes. And Christmas is right around the corner, you guys!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, it's getting cold, so make sure you bundle up nice and warm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is, no joke, the most comfortable hoodie I've ever owned.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You'll be wearing it all the time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Soft as hell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was a little worried when we started doing actual wearable merch, I was like, it's going to end up being that chintzy stuff that we don't want to hawk, but I'm actually really happy that it came out pretty high-quality.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I miss school relay races.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, go ahead. Nothing. Don't worry about it. Keep going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Without further ado, last we picked up, Vox Machina, who had been traveling to collect the Vestiges of Divergence, artifacts from an old ancient time to gain enough power to combat the Chroma Conclave, a group of chromatic dragons that assailed-- (burps) pardon-- Tal'Dorei, led by Thordak the Cinder King. When you get nervous, you get the burps. I feel like Robert Durst.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Robert Kraft, the owner of the Patriots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Different guy. You, in searching these artifacts, found that one in the city of Ank'Harel had been taken out from under your nose by a long-forgotten NPC named Ripley.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, she wasn't forgotten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So. What do you want to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (chuckles) We have no idea.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, did she originally take Percy's gun? Was that what she was using?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think so. She took his designs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He threw Percy's gun into the pool of acid.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should we collect her gun now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're all extremely emotional, but we need to move quickly if we're going to do anything. We need to collect all the guns.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should collect her guns. We need her other hand, and we need the Vestiges off of her fucking body.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, let's collect those. Quickly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Will you do the honors of taking her other hand?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would love to use my teeth for that. No, I'll use the axe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. With a heavy thud sound, her hand is jettisoned from the wrist, her left hand, as it scatters across the broken glass floor of the center of the jungle here in Glintshore.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This one, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's only one, so yes, that's the one.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bag of Colding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fair enough. Kynan is still standing there, the adrenaline wearing off of him. And he's at a good 15, 20-foot distance from all of you just standing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I forgot, are we killing him?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hold on a second. I walk over. Do you have the blade?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he picks it up and holds it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I've come a long way for that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Take it." He throws it to your feet and it spins and scatters and comes to a halt at the tip of your boot

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait here a moment, please. I bend down, I take the knife, and I walk it over to Keyleth and put it in her hands. And I walk back to him. How?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I didn't mean for any of this to happen."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How? There are people behind me who want you dead, and I cannot blame them. How?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And I left Emon and my home to seek that destiny and I'm sure many of you did the same."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you know what shape Emon is in right now? And

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You don't know what I've been through!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What has that man done to you? What has she done to you? What have any of them, except for me, done to you? And what have I done except be an asshole?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She said

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Summoned the dragons?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You were responsible for it. She had me listen in to a conversation where you admitted "that it was your fault."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'd like to make an insight check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (sighs) No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He seems emotionally on the brim of a complete nervous breakdown, but he's holding his ground. His hands are shaking in place as he stands staring at you with the look of a man on the precipice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kynan, what am I to do with you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll deal with him later.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I ought to cut the heart from your ribs. I ought to cut out my own! Is there anyone else here, now? Is that it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, we went back to the cavern to set up, but you got here too quickly--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How long have you been here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Only a few hours."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A few hours was all it took for that? Are there more of you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We have a few people on the ship."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not anymore.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Listen to me. I don't know what's going to happen in the next 24 hours for you, but the best thing you can do right now is help us. When anyone asks you to do something, you do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I would ask for a chance to redeem myself, but I am also beginning to understand what "I've done. And I accept whatever judgment you see fit. Just know that-- just know that "I've been very confused."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Look at me. Kynan, look at me. You help right now. Put all that out of your mind. Right now, you help. Can you do that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whispering) "How can I help?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just do whatever we ask.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Whatever you want me to tell you. I know a little bit. Anything, just let me know."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're going to table this. Just be Johnny-on-the-spot right now, all right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (tearfully) Grog? Can you pick him up? Percy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Where am I taking him?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have nothing left. I have no way to get us out of here quickly right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I ask, is Orthax still here? That's who that was, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Orthax could have his soul, for all we know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we sense him? Is Orthax around? Can you sense evil?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I could, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you sense as part of your paladin ability. Divine Sense, I believe it was?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. 60 feet: demons, celestials, devils.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, as you guys are going through Ripley's things, you do sense there is a pulse of fiendish energy emanating from somewhere near Ripley's body.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Near Ripley's body?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do we destroy him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think we can. He's just a shadow, isn't he?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have to go to him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, I was going to ask the question of could he help us with Percy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Orthax?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Honestly, right now I think-- it sounds crazy that I'm saying this, but we have mutual interests with him. It might not be the worst idea.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's inspecting Ripley's body?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I will, I guess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do find the cloak. The dagger that Kynan used still lays to the ground. No, it was handed to you, so you have it right now. There is what appears to be a small polished grey stone with a couple of runic symbols carved into it. You also find what appears to be a small leather case, a long thin case about that long, that is latched shut. And her gun. Which is similar to Percy's Pepperbox, but thinner, longer, more refined. It's a deep gunmetal gray color with brass sections and what appear to be portions of whitestone built into it. As she pulls the gun out, you immediately know that that's the direct source of the fiendish energy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Put that down. Please. Put it on the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's in the gun?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's in the gun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just like last time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we drop it in acid again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, that didn't kill it, did it? Just got it out of the gun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And what if he has Percy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, let's try and get him back first before we get upset about it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do we get him to Whitestone?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. How do we move?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have an airship.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That'll be too slow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe it can take us somewhere with trees.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Somewhere with a tree.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I need to rest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How long?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I need to sleep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This tree is stunted that's coming out of Ripley's body?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are trees available in this jungle that in theory could be used for that spell, if you had it available to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't remember, do we have a way to call Pike?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have the stone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, does that send one of us back to her?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Potentially.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One living soul holding a dead soul?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or can we bring her to us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could try and scry her. Let me see, actually.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could try putting Percy in the necklace and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Going through? Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But what if you can't get him back out? Living and willing, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We don't want him to get stuck.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that correct?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No disrespect, he's an object right now. So if one of used the stone, holding him, it'd be carrying him like a sword. He'd go through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intelligence check. With plus two because of your Jack of All Trades. Add your intelligence modifier plus two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shame, intelligence check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's still considered a creature. It's just a dead creature.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we rest and then we go to Whitestone in the morning.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you do the mansion, Scanlan? Are you tapped out?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could, but--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't believe that there's nothing we can do right now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could stay here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I still bring Trinket out of the necklace, and I cast Cure Wounds on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, yeah. As Trinket emerges from the necklace, his unconscious form hits the ground, laying on the side. As you walk up and place your hand, still breathing, and your warm touch presses across his fur and the breathing inflates into one deep breath and then (bear noises) the head leans up and begins licking your hand as you finish the casting of the spell. Go ahead and roll hit points for Trinket.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm also going to give him a butt scratch and do Lay on Hands and give him another five hit points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nine whole points. Plus five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also do notice, Vex, on the gun, it has across the handle, the bottom of the handle, the name of the weapon, which is named Animus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Animus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And across the barrels you now see there are three empty barrels and three that still have names.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I read the names?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The names are: Rictor Wells, Oz Grud, and King Bertrand Dwendal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rictor Wells, Oz Grud, and King Bertrand Dwendal. Apparently all people that Ripley in some way, shape, or form felt vengeful towards.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to walk over and pick up the false arm that I hacked off. Will you put this in the bag?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which one? Oh, regular bag.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This big, old arm here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I see the little stone with the runes on it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why don't we ask Kynan what it is? Maybe he's seen her use it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kynan, what is this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's what she used to listen in on you guys."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ugh. Hang on, wait let me see it. Does it look like the other Scrying Stone that we have?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It's a very different enchantment. This one looks a little simpler, and upon looking at it there's no magic left in it. You did disenchant the other side of the enchantment, of her old gun.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about the little latch box that's closed?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I open the latch box.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just rip everything out of my hands. Go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We all simultaneously tear it open.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as you open the cap on the edge of this leather casing, you pull it open. You see it's essentially a side scroll case. On the inside, there is a single tightly wound piece of parchment. The smell immediately is very musty and old with a hint of burnt wood. And yeah, there's some sort of parchment that is tightly coiled in there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should I take it out and take a look?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Read that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you seen her messing with that, Kynan?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That was something we found in the cave when we got here. But she quickly grabbed it and put it away and wouldn't tell us what it was."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What is this cave?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I only got to the outside of it. I was standing guard."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So you haven't been inside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Maybe a couple of miles. It's at the base of the mountain."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if that was her escape route? What if there's a way out?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, could be. I'll open it and look it over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make an arcana check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Be careful, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not good. Do I add Jack of All Trades? Is that a thing now? 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you add it to all ability checks and skills you're not proficient in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am proficient in this. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14. That's fine. That's enough. Yes, it is a Scroll of Gate.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A Gate scroll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good thing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, we just got our ticket out of here!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The scroll allows an arcane caster to use an action to cast the 9th-level spell Gate.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we have an arcane caster? Is that you? Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Am I an arcane caster?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you are an arcane caster. Consider this is an extremely powerful spell that has a lot of various uses, so consider. Just so you know what it's capable of, I'm going to read you some of the spell here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Also, I might not be able to do it because it says level nine. If the spell is higher than the level the caster can use, then they must make a spellcasting ability check to succeed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, so just cut off your foot as a tithe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Gate, just so you know: You conjure a portal linking an unoccupied space you can see within range to a precise location on a different (or the same) plane of existence. The portal is a circular opening which you can make five to 20 feet in diameter. It lasts for up to a minute. The portal has a front and back on each plane where it appears. It would be between planes essentially. I would say if you wanted to use it as just a teleportation circle, you could, but it's a waste of a 9th-level spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But it's a waste of a 9th-level spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Comparatively to what she can do with Tree Stride and other things like that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We might want to save it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it different from Plane Shift?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it has a lot of various uses.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could bring the rakshasa through.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could. If we knew its name.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We stow it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can bring a lot of things through on that, instantly, for better or for worse.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hotis, Orthax.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That is how it's different from Plane Shift.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or we could use this to go save our friend.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do we know about these healing spells?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What healing spells?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, what we need to do to Percy. How long do we have? To get him to someone?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a feeling the longer we wait, the harder it will be.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Then we rest now, yeah? Hard choices, but we have to help ourselves if we plan to help him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But like you said, the Gate spell could theoretically bring Orthax back, if we might need to. Who knows?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or it could bring a healer to us right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I say save it and rest. That's my vote.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How long has Percy been dead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, maybe 20, 25 minutes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Voice your opinions now. Do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know how death magic works.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't, either.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know if eight hours makes this huge difference.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It depends on what you're trying to do. I have one ability I could use. You have to do it within ten days. But I'm not necessarily comfortable doing it, regardless. I don't know, I've never done it before, and I don't know the ramifications. I'd prefer to get him to Pike.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Then let's summon the mansion and do this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If any one finds any of these, they could be retrofitted or used for evil in the future and that's something that Percy would not want. Ever.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll go get them, because I'm still doing pretty dandy and I'll absorb all the glass shards from walking around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I feel like we should look in this cavern, don't you think?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could go.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll stay with Percy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Someone has to stay with him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. If you two want to go check the cavern, I'll collect all the guns and check the bodies of the people that are down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we have taken a short rest to heal a bit before we do anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could do that. Just half an hour to an hour. You can do that. So you guys take a short rest now to use any of your hit dice to go ahead and heal up. And Scanlan's giving Song of Rest, so you get an additional--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 1d12 to each one of you guys on top of whatever you're healing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth takes Percy's body and I drag him over to the table and I lay him out and I start cleaning him and cleaning his wounds as best as I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's a bloody mess. But at the same time, there is a strange look of peace on his face. It both comforts and upsets you. And you have a hard time concentrating on the face. You're just focusing on the body as you clean him and make him look as good as you possibly can using Druidcraft and other spells at your disposal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Guns and bodies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. Oh, minus two. 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find two pistols, two rifles. There is also a long-barreled Bad News-like rifle that was discarded across the battlefield by Ripley earlier in the fight. It's busted. There is a greatsword and a set of full plate that were on the goliath that you battled.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Full plate?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Full plate, yes. You find a total of 185 rounds of small ammunition.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. For the pistols?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And about 26 rounds of large ammunition for the rifles.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Got it. 26 rounds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find a potion of superior healing on the smashed corpse of the wizard that didn't get a chance to use it before it fell to its horrible death. That's a really good one. A set of Bracers of Defense, plus two, which I think you've encountered previously.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you can write that down. And yeah, that's all you find on the corpses.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Those Bracers of Defense need to be attuned?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you wanted to take the time to inspect them during the short rest.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So. While he's doing that, you guys go off to the cave?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. And I'm going to look for traps the entire way there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to ride my broom there so I don't get any damage walking on the glass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Is Kynan staying behind with you guys?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can keep him, and he can help me look for the dog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does he make one, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes you the better part of 30 minutes or so, but the needle in the haystack was not as hard a search as you thought, and you find it wedged between two branches back in its hard onyx form. Unscathed, seemingly, from the explosion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just scratch him behind his ear. Sorry! Maybe we'll do more next time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys, because you're going to check for traps as you go? Go ahead and roll an investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's no smoke. There is a heavy sulfurous smell as you get close and actually begin to enter the front of the cave. Do you guys continue forward into the cavern?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it dark in there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. There's no light source. You guys can still see up to a certain distance okay without light.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could I--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll check for traps again. I'll pull out the flame tongue dagger to get a little more light.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Little bit of torch light.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I set fire to the tip of an arrow and shoot it using Oracle Shot into the cave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Go ahead and make your investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is structure. Someone has refined elements of the interior of this tunnel. That's the best you can make out with the arrow's placement.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You all right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what purpose it serves.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I walk in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you guys continue following the path that the arrow did, the tunnel winds back and forth a bit. It pinches and then curves quickly to the right, where you find the arrow still lying there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stealth, please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a stealth check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I check for anything that looks out of place, any danger or anything? Traps, if you will.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check, while you're stealthing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Terrible investigation.11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems safe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It seems so safe.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you stealthing, as well?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure. 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To the right was what you got the glimpse at. To the left, it just continues, the same kind of porous rock. And it's like a volcanic tube, that general erosion built a floor that's a little less wide than the walls, which are spherical in shape.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So, on the right, it's natural, and on the left it's more altered.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Other way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Other way. So one is natural, one is touched.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do feel a little bit of burning in the lungs from proximity.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there tracks at all in the cave?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a few footfalls going through the dust. Very hastily. They're like jogging-paced footfalls. And even just from some of the tracking you've done previously in the day, some of these footfalls are of the people that you encountered earlier, including Ripley.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like they've already been in here, and she took what she found.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's be sure. I'll take point. I start walking down the altered path.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Following the path that we see her footsteps in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everything here is burnt. And elements of this look like a large fiery event transpired in here that destroyed much of what once was a more structured interior. And this altar, while it remains in place, it look like it suffered severe damage in the past. The skulls and rocks that are there, most of them are broken, cracked and thrown against the walls. This looks very old. It looks like this place hasn't been touched in a very long time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Anything that looks like a teleportation circle or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Investigation check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sighs) Natural one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got an 18. No, I got a 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't find anything that resembles a teleportation circle. What you do find is in the altar. It appears that there was a compartment that has since been opened up that is left vacuous and empty. It appears to have been recently disturbed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. This is what Ripley took. This is where she found the scroll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And once you do that, looking at the little bit of ashy soot that was on the outside of the scroll, you do get the sense that that was probably what was taken from this altar.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we waste our time with the other passage, or do we go back?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (tearfully) Let's go back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, you guys make your way back to the rest of the camp. You've cleaned up Percy to the best of your ability. You've gathered all the materials from all the other corpses around the battlefield. You and Kynan return with your onyx dog. What are you going to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We sleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Super restful, just the most restful sleep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's going to be a great night. We'll hang out, tell stories about Percy, cry a bunch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not yet!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, you're right. All right. What time is it? How long have we been awake? Should we let the airship know so they don't keep hovering?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. I'll fly over to them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have flares.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but they might not understand what it means. I'll fly over to them and tell them, what, they can go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we don't-- I guess. Is there anything we need from them? They can bring the arm back to Ank'Harel. Weren't we supposed to bring her arm back to Ank'Harel?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but there wasn't a time limit on that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll mail it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll just hold onto it for now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll fly up to the airship.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're basically just waiting for your guys' order to come and attack. As you come to the edge, you see Captain Damon immediately rush up and goes, "We saw some sort of explosion on the island. Is everyone all right?" Immediately his expression drops, and he steps on to the back of his heels and drops his hands in front of him in a very business-type setup. "I'm sorry."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can take the airship back to Ank'Harel if you want.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where are you going?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Somewhere with... clerics. I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very good. I guess, if you need me and my crew, come find us in Ank'Harel."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The vibration creaks. They glow a brighter blue as the ship turns around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you leave your purse?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, my wallet! No, but I go back up and I say to Captain Damon: Are you willing to join a fight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Explain."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Those dragons destroyed our home. We could use an airship in the fight against them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're outfitted to take down relatively dangerous prey, but--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You wouldn't be fighting alone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean no offense here, and the honorable goal is fantastic, "but I also have a crew to feed."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course. There's a lot of gold there. A lot of riches.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've been rolling so well tonight.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll learn the details later, but I'm happy to help. Convincing them will take some "coin, but where would you like us to go?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (quietly) Oh shit. Should I?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're not there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sighs) Do you know where Whitestone is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've not been there, but I can figure it out."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's in the mountains.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I can get us there."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm trusting you with that location.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Captain Damon goes, "We'll meet you in Whitestone."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Safe travels."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ship continues making its way southward, turning around slowly to start turning more northeast direction. You guys watch as you see the ship go overhead from the island, heading in the opposite direction of Ank'Harel. Eventually, Vex makes her way back to your location on the island.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How'd it go with Damon?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're getting married. It's wonderful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I knew it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're heading to Whitestone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Aren't we not supposed to tell anybody about Whitestone? Didn't we have some blood pact, don't ever say the word Whitestone?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We did.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Also, isn't it invisible?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great. All right, well, maybe they'll find it, anyway.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shall we?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you do the thing, Scan-man?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. I'll house it up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you summon Scanlan's Magnificent Mansion, you all come to a familiar space, spectral servants waiting to wait on you. But the somber atmosphere still remains. You find your way to your respective rooms, and if there's anything you'd like to do before the evening's rest, now's the time to speak up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, just an idea. Everybody remembers when they were kids putting blankets out in the living room and sleeping. I don't really want to go back to my room. Want to camp out in the den together?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we can make a blanket fort.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sounds good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Didn't you ever have blanket forts, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I didn't have blankets.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll show you how it's done.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where do we put Percival?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. We're still a team.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That sounds a little weird, you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll put him on a table, and we'll all sleep around him on the floor. It'll be super weird.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Save your tears for later.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth also pulls a Vex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take out the dagger and I hand it to Vex-- to Vax, sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I take one of the blankets, and I cover up Percy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kynan is still by the door.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't pay them any mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stay in the room, but give us a little bit of space.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey. We'll work it out. Have faith.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He doesn't say anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I go back to the group.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And we sleep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Make it all pretty, and sleep, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whatever your maximum hit die is, you recover half that for the evening's rest. You're at full hit points, and your spells are returned to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're normal again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, that's debatable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog is at level 15, so you would get back eight of your hit dice that you've spent.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (sing-song) Morning comes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. What's the plan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we're recovered. How'd you guys sleep? Everyone sleep okay? Not great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we Tree Stride, Keyleth? Can we go?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, let's go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's just staring at the floor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kynan, is it? Do me a favor. Sulk around this group a little bit later. Otherwise, I might kill you right now. So fall in line and pick your chin up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's not reacting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I give him some water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He doesn't drink any of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should get up. We're leaving.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we bringing him with us?

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He stands up slowly and just follows you like a ghost right now. What's the plan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Got to find a tree.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Go to tree. Go to Sun Tree.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where we going?

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Whitestone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Closest, biggest, fattest tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sun is setting. It's later in the afternoon, evening.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We go to Pike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike immediately.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. There is still that faint shimmer on the sky above you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have Percy over my shoulders, fireman carry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys arrive, a number of people who live in Whitestone--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fireman carry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys begin walking away from the Sun Tree, you can see a bunch of townsfolk and some guards begin to walk up to greet you, and be like, "You've returned--" Immediately, the energy is felt and everyone steps away and gives you space as people begin to see the limp body of Percival being held over Grog's shoulder.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Someone should get Cassandra.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Immediately. Tell them we're coming. To prepare quarters.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right away." The guard rushes off up towards the Castle Whitestone. Are you guys walking towards the Castle Whitestone, as well?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's where Pike is, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is she building a temple here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a temple being built here, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In the castle?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. The temple would be within the city itself.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And that's where she was last seen?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we try the earrings? Does Pike have her earring?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, she's got to have her earring, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike, can you hear us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, you who have been suffering a very sleepless night, feeling some amorphous heartbreak that you haven't been able to define yet that has prevented you from closing eyes without spells of sudden anxiety and sadness, hear the voice come peeking through, and the immediacy of Vex's tone is both comforting and immediately confirming a terrible fright that you've had lingering at the back of your mind.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Vex?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where are you, darling?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm in the temple. Where are you? I know something's wrong.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (tearfully) We're coming to find you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To Sarenrae's temple.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you approach, it's pretty much a hovel, but is making its way. As you approach, you can see the front door open, and there Pike's form, long silver- and gold-colored evening wear, her hair tousled around her face, the little bit of wind that's blowing through causing it to tumble against one chin. She looks out the rest of you with sadness across her eyes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I knew something was wrong. Where is he?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We bring him inside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're general townsfolk. They're not heavy into any specific use aside from cleaning and helping construct. But they bring a large table out, and you guys set Percy on top of it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike, can you do something? Can you help him?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to try.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're here with you, Pike.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Whatever we can do to help. We just knew we couldn't do this without you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to cast Resurrection on him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Resurrection? What does that do? Does it just bring him back?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does Resurrection just bring him back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are two spells at your disposal. There is Resurrection, which is a 7th-level spell. It costs a diamond worth 1,000 gold, which the spell consumes. Or there is Raise Dead, which is a 5th-level spell, which consumes a diamond worth 500 gold pieces, but the target has to have been dead no longer than ten days.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so we could do that. What does Resurrection do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The same thing, but the person could have been dead for up to a century.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there a better chance with Resurrection?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say, being a 7th-level spell, I would give a very faint modifier, depending.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, Vex. We could save 500 gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bring out the best diamond I have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got a whole 40-pound bag of gems.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What was that, Ash?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: With Raise Dead, is there-- (sighs) what is my question? How whole does he come back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whole. With both spells, he comes back whole. If it works.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, Pike, no!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, how grief does strange things to people!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or we could buy him a better tombstone if we had the extra money!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's terrible, Scanlan!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: His glasses are broken. We could fix his glasses.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is Percival Fredrickstein Von Musel Klossowski de Rolo III. He needs a large-ass diamond. Pull out the biggest one you've got.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A thousand-gold diamond.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's do it. He's a de Rolo. He deserves the best.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Pike, you begin to set the stage for the ritual. You begin to pull out the sage. This temple, as simple as it is, but simple is the nature of Sarenrae, one who does not have much worshiping influence in this world. You know that she requires just enough, and the faith is stronger than the presentation, but you pull out the best you can all the offerings that are necessary. You scrawl out the various divine runic symbols that represent healing, that represent connection to one's divine entity, that represent stalwartness and strength of heart, that represent love and family, everything you can think of that really binds this ritual to the moment. As you guys are sitting around to prepare, you begin the incantation of the ritual. The first stage allows you to reach out and make contact with the spirit wherever it is. After five minutes of searching, you have no way of locating it. The spirit, currently-- something is blocking it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it Orthax?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ritual's unable to reach out.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How do I find out what it is?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there a way to find out what it is that's blocking it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may have to think about it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Insight check, or can I--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Religion. It's Orthax.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pull out Ripley's gun, and I hand it to Pike while she's still in her ritual, and see if that has any effect.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As Keyleth hands you the gun, that strange blockage becomes crystalline. What was once a dark spot that was preventing you from clarifying your vision is now a clear patch of shadow. Having seen this once before, Orthax is indeed blocking the ritual and is currently hungrily feasting on the soul of Percival.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In the gun?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do we draw him out?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we try and destroy the gun again? Do we do this again?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if we carve his name back onto the barrel?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if we use that scroll to go to him now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go to Percy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Or go to Orthax.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can pull Orthax through the gate.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or kill him on his home turf and kill him for real.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's a shadow fiend. Does that mean we have to kill him on his own turf? Do we know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say, Pike, make a religion check, and make an intelligence check, Scanlan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I make a religion check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, yes, you can, as well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Check? Just a check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Holding this, the essence of Orthax, a shadow demon like this. Orthax was not destroyed and sent back to his plane. Orthax cannot be sent back to its plane when it's bound to whatever its crux is. Whatever object that Orthax has used as its focus holds it in this plane and it cannot be destroyed on its plane while it's attached to that object. The gun right now is essentially the anchor that Orthax is using.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to destroy the gun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Destroy the gun or find a way to break the connection.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Didn't you detach Craven Edge from me? Didn't you sever a thread? Didn't that happen?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you reach out? Can you do that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike did that, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How'd you do that, Pikey?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm trying to remember!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't even remember, and it happened to me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, you were dead, weren't you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No excuse.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wasn't it a something-evil spell?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Could we throw the gun into the little hole under Whitestone Castle?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There also still acid.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! What if we brought the gun in front of the circle? It cancels out the magic of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Throw it in the circle?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or just bring in there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it an arcane magic like that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know. We could try.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There is acid. We could do the same exact thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And repeat history, Scanlan.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think it was Greater Restoration.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was right. That's what severed it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You want to try a Greater Restoration spell, is that what you're saying?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On what?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: On the gun.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you do that to an object?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's what she did for--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She could see a thread that was connecting us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing, Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: To the gun? Is that even going to make any sense?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you want me to try it?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I mean, in case this doesn't work--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll try to recreate what Pike did to Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The shadow screams and vanishes and there you see a brief glimmer of light, the remaining spirit of Percival as it drifts off into the Astral Sea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I scream: Percy!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The barrels are now clean.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike, do it!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I continue working on the Resurrection spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, who wants to aid in this resurrection ritual? Who has something to offer as a part of this skill challenge?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would like to inspire her, at least. Is that something that will help?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Inspiring whoever wants to be part of the ritual, yeah. You can go ahead and inspire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I reach forward and look in Percy's coat for that condensed whitestone that he carries?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Go ahead and make an investigation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Vex, will you look for that raven skull that I gave him while you're at it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure. 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25. You start rummaging through his coat and you find his gun, Retort. You find a bunch of random bullet casings and bullets. You find a cluster of papers and notes that are folded up in a small book, and what appears to be a partially sealed letter with no name on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nothing else?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You eventually find some of the whitestone glass, the green glass that you guys had flashed around in Ank'Harel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does he still have the raven skull on him that I gave him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The raven skull is still on him. It hangs around his neck, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I put it on his chest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. What do you want to offer to the skill challenge for this event? Something that you as an individual bring to this and bring to the connection to Percy to try and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whitestone still needs you, darling. I still need you here. And I lean down and I kiss him, and I say, I should have told you: it's yours.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I trust you. Okay. Who else wants to add something to this ritual?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt, would I inspire Pike or Percy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to inspire Pike, Pike could attempt to bring something to the ritual and then could use your inspiration die on top of what her check is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I assume she's going to bring something to the ritual, right? I assume?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So how do you inspire?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You have a d12 inspiration die, Pike. What do you want to try and bring to the ritual on top of your casting the spell to draw him back? What do you want to bring to the ritual?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (tearfully) This is so stressful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can try anything. How well it fits will depend on how high the difficulty class is.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Right. I think, clearly, I would hope that Sarenrae would come in and step in and help in this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you sing? Can you sing, Pike, like you did for that little boy? Percy joined you then.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I could.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Didn't you have that thing that brings your god to help once a day?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Divine intervention?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I use that along with this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll let you, yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, heck yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Roll a d10. Let me know what you roll first.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you roll?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I rolled a three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Imploring to her and the connection you do have through the Divine Gate, I want you to go ahead and make a religion check. Roll a d20 and add your religion modifier.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Come on. 18?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Do you want to add your d12 inspiration from Scanlan?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes. That's ten. An extra ten, so what did I say? 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, gotcha. One final skill challenge check to make. Who wishes to add to this?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I have a notion, but you are very close to him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I grab the skull from around his neck that I gave him. I say: Percy, we had many conversations about life and death, and in many ways, you were my total opposite. But you are also my best friend. Even though I told you that day that I gave you this that we're all going to die and that you can still be saved from yourself, it was clear the journey was far from over, and it still isn't. And then I'm going to cast Conjure Woodland Beings, and I'm going to have a barrage of crows come from around me. I'm going to tell him: As much as you might think your journey is over, just because yours might be, ours isn't. And we need you. And I need you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like a cloak.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With advantage because of Vax helping you. This is in particular a challenge for you because persuasion's already been used. You as your point of leadership and strength of character, you're piercing through the veil and through the ritual to appeal to him as a person to another through sheer force of charismatic persuasion. With advantage. Adding your charisma bonus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Use the gold die. Percy. 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His pale skin pale as it's ever been, but now slowly stirring.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (sighs with relief)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Pike!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll take a picture of that just so everyone knows.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Taliesin, get your butt in here!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's so quiet. We should just let him sleep.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is too fucking much, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike, you're in a temple! Don't curse.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't care.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You said he's still unconscious?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still unconscious.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh. Well, I cast Lay on Hands and take him out of that, right away. Ten hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percival! Get back in your chair.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Get your monkey ass back in that chair!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've been watching South Park. I don't know about the rest of you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No Hamlet death for you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me tweet out the photo real fast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like we need to take a break. Can we take our break? I'm going to throw up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, this would be a great time to go ahead and take a break. We're going to go ahead and go take a quick break.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good job, Ashley!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ashley, you did it! You have one job, Ashley! One job!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Two jobs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Those were some good rolls, man, and apparently a convincing-- I was literally waiting for a text from Taliesin to let me know, based on how the ritual went, whether or not Percival felt it was enough to bring him back, even if it would have succeeded.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would have been great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll be back here in a number of minutes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (hoarsely) Did we say the right thing? Clearly?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll tell you when the camera's off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percival, freshly breathing on the table in the partially constructed small temple to Sarenrae in the city of Whitestone, apparently successful, his spirit restored. You come to consciousness as a tiny hand is smacking you in the face.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's like that little doll hand on SNL.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I use my missile grab again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do not open my eyes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's awake! He's alive! Ow!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I slap him in the face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: His reflexes are working. His reflexes are working great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (gasping)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Welcome back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (hoarsely) Where are we?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Your home. Our home.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit. Can you see? Are his glasses broken?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His glasses are cracked.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't feel well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You want to feel better?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ripley is dead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Deader than dead. She's torn asunder. We have parts of her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's good news. There's only one part we need. Well, two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did we keep both her hands?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We did!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I thought one was a fake.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd like to see it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. All right. That's a weird request when you just wake up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, your sister's going to be running up in here very soon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh god, no. I'm going to lie back down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where is he? Is he all right?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to throw up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You scared me. I heard he was--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everything's fine, dear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, just a few more dragons and I'll take a break. It'll be fine. I'm tired.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks over towards you, Pike, and nods and says, "Thank you."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You're welcome.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs heavily)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Get some food in you and stop being so bloody useless," and slaps you upside the face and turns around and leaves the temple.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If everybody had just slapped my face while I was dead, that would have been so much more convenient.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who says we didn't?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That wasn't the worst of it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it was really not. I am very tired.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, you spent last night on a table, which is much beneath a man of your station.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy, you were gone for quite a while.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How long?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A day.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Only a day?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How long did it feel?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you remember?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing worth repeating.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I beg to differ.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The smallest one. You can teach me how to use it on weekends.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll discuss this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Laughter. Laughter's back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you for what you did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I saw what you did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you mean you saw what I did?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was the only thing I saw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you hear me yell for you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. (sighs)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes? I'm glad that that's not waiting for me any more.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you sure?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he gone?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you still feel him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd rather not think about it at the moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You should rest and get better.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I'm going to rest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bedtime, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hello, Pike!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't suppose you've had time to read any of those books.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I've had lots of time on my hands.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll an insight check. Pike, roll a deception check.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes! Here we go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you roll?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike, what'd you roll a deception check?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's lying through her fucking teeth, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pike!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey, it was a joke! Trying to make everyone laugh?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You just lied to me. I'm so proud of you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm learning.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so proud of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was very clever, Pike.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You should do that more often.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I give Percy a big hug.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (groans)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Please don't do that again?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you thank her for the necklace?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you for the necklace. That was--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Not enough?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, apparently just enough, because here we are, and she's been dealt with. So it was just enough. (sighs) I'm very tired.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You should sleep, and we'll talk more tomorrow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to not sleep in here, wherever this is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, this is still a construction zone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is this what you've been building?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's not very cozy yet, but it's coming around.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know if cozy is really the point. I'm going to lie down somewhere soft.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We should all go back to the castle, then.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll go dump a few healing spells and stuff into him. Let's get you to lie down first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you go and heal him up. You guys make your way back to the castle. The guards are there waiting. As you enter, you can see there, sitting in the foyer, talking and discussing, is Jarett and Gilmore, who both look a little nervous and intense about apparently recently hearing what happened. As soon as you enter, Gilmore turns. "I take that as a good sign. He's standing."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am literally using my gun as a crutch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And what did we learn? Don't get killed again!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Should we show them what we got?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do we have?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You heal 48 hit points, by the way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. I don't even know what hit point level I'm at.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd be at one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm at 49.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do we have to show them?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We have two Vestiges to show them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit, I haven't even looked at the cloak. I tucked it away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have two Vestiges.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I pull out the cloak.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Get it identified.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You halve the damage you take from the spell, if there's any damage to be taken, "and the cloak gains a number of charges equal to the spell level of the triggering spell."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All this arcane terminology is fascinating.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Essentially, what this does is you can use your reaction to swallow a spell if you're hurt by one. Even if you're not hurt by it, you can still swallow a spell. You can only use it once per short rest. But it does half damage to you and-- (static from Ashley's microphone)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Excuse you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It gains a number of charges equal to the spell level that you absorb. Up to a maximum of six charges can be stored in the cloak. So, six charges. If you have the cloak on and you hit with an attack, you can expend any number of charges from the cloak to deal an additional 1d6 lightning damage per charge.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you could do an additional 6d6 lightning damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, onto an attack that you deal with the cloak. That's what Cabal's Ruin does.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it have to be a magic user to wear it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. In fact, it doesn't channel through spells. It channels through physical attacks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, melee attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Melee weapon attacks is how the enchantment works.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Groggy? Percy?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog in a cloak?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percy, you'd look pretty swag in that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But you already have a Vestige.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, Groggy. So does this go to Percy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You should wear that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was worn by the woman who tried to kill you. And succeeded.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's pretty cool.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about the other Vestige?

lines.name: SAM, LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Whisper.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How are you doing, Shaun?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What do you mean? I'm doing fantastic."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How are you holding up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I mean, you all look tired, exhausted, and emotionally drained. So do I! "So I think we're all doing our part."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your parents are lovely, by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) "Ah, yes."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you so much again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We gave them a bunch of water.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Didn't he give us something to give to them? Did we do that? Yes, we gave them what you told us to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The locket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you. I appreciate that."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We told them you're doing great and we told them you were doing fantastic and wonderful and successful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, thank you. When all this is done, I should go visit. It's been a while."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They seem very proud of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Taken a while."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They told us you weren't potty-trained until you were six. Is that true?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whenever Whisper is thrown, you can choose to transform into shadow and merge with the blade, teleporting instantly to wherever the blade impacts. Which means you can teleport as far as you can throw the dagger, which is the max range of the dagger. Yeah, so 60 feet, you go wherever it throws to. If the target is a creature, you emerge adjacent to the target in a space of your choice around the creature. Whenever you critically hit a creature with an attack with Whisper, the target has to make a wisdom saving throw against a DC 18 or become frightened of you for one minute.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about Keyleth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's up to you guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're going to fight with a little-- you want it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. What am I going to do with it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I honestly would like to make a case for it. Just consider one thing: I chase people around the battlefield. And I really have a hard time getting to them sometimes. It'd be really great to travel 50 feet, then throw another 60, and then be right on their fucking asses.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do they happen in the same turn? They happen in the same turn, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. The minute you throw and hit something, it immediately teleports you if you choose. It doesn't have to happen. You could throw it, and then it hits the ground and you stay where you are if you want to, but if you choose, you can travel with the blade and essentially appear Nightcrawler-style in shadow next to whatever you hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This knife is so sexy, though, and you are so invulnerable to everything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Obviously, daggers are your bag, baby.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What if--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You arm wrestle for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. What, give him this? I'm considering giving you my cloak instead.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Haste? No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your armor?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No! My cloak.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which one's that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Displacer cloak.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does that do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Makes you very hard to hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but Grog doesn't need that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He doesn't need anything. He's got a thousand hit points.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I need to be attuned to Whisper?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, all of these.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to be attuned to Whisper, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Somebody else can have it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If there was anything else you need me to look at, I still have "a full score of simple tricks."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Simple tricks?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Is there anything else you want me to look at before I go to bed, because it's late."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What time is it, Shaun?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's, I'd say, nine in the evening.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nine. Percival, you should go to bed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, I have an old music box. Can you look at it and see if it's magical?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: An old wooden music box?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes the music box. Eyes flare up. "No, it's an impressive music box."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just a music box? Lovely.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, you read Marquesan. The language of Marquet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Marquesian, but yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Marquesian. I got this book, found this book in this shitty casino office. It's written in Marquesian.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I think it found the right owner."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh. It's a porno.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's an instructional guide. You might learn something."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's an instructional guide?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't read it, though. How will I learn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Maybe you start taking classes in Marquesian."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are there any illustrations?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, pictures. You like pictures, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think that one folds out. That's quite nice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, ooh?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Scanlan, isn't there anything else you need to deliver to one of these two fine gentlemen?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I believe there is something you acquired for one of these two gents.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ix-nay on the ice-spay. There are authorities around.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why are you calling spice "ice-spay?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, if someone hears you talking about this shit, you could be in deep trouble.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am literally the living embodiment of law and justice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jarett.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How was your journey?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was great! (quietly) Do you spice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We had a great time! (quietly) Do you spice, boss? Do you want to spice something?
