lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you brought some, yes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I give him one bag of spice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is a lot of fusaka. Thank you very much. That lasts a long time."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He spent 50 gold on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You paid 50 gold for this?!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For the pair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But I appreciate it. It's very thoughtful."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was worth it to see the smile on your face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, thank you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's really quite lovely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Great! I'll give you some tips on how to prepare it, but you know what? I'll cook "a classic Marquesian feast in the coming days for all of us in thank you for the spice."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, Jarett.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is Kynan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's been ghosting you guys the whole time, looking extremely nervous.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kynan has been telling me that he wanted to help protect Whitestone. He hasn't anywhere to live. He needs something to do with his time, and he has a fire in his belly and wants to serve.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything. Whatever I can do." Jarett walks up and puts his hand on his shoulder and goes, "Well, first off, you need to be more "assertive. You are talking like a sniveling coward. You need to project your chest, shoulders "back, and when you speak, you speak with intent and-- ah, it's late. We'll work on it tomorrow."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I may have a thought for the boy later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh! Before I forget, this came for you, Keyleth."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A letter?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Letters! We got letters!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't know who it's from."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What did they look like?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How did they get through the invisible wall?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How do they know my name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know. They were sent from Westruun, I think it was."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit. Open that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's got something thick in it, which isn't--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Could be a seal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Read the letter first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Read the letter first?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's in Marquesian.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's long.

lines.name: PATRICKROTHFUSS
lines.text: Kindly, Kerr.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (hoarsely) Holy shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's the thing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know what to say.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you all right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was Kerr.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he proposing to you? (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's got branches on it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's quite beautiful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does it say something?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have passed through fire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow. Motherfucker, that's cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is a lot to deal with right now. We have friends. I have a friend.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're becoming a wonderful leader, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And as kind as his letter was, I think something was wrong, and I think there's more to his message. Vex, maybe you? He scribbled out some words.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let me see.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And speaks vaguely in areas around them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can't tell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Those are called words, Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know. Maybe he just didn't like what he wrote.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check, Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking at handwriting and the way it's scribbled out, the scribble is hastily, and little bits of text that come through, it appears that they are just thoughts that he may have felt uncomfortable putting in the letter after writing them out, and then scratched them out. There doesn't appear to be any serious agency or danger around them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think it's fine, Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You sure? I worry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think he perhaps bared his heart a little too much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you mean?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe he said things he thought better of.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know what to say. It's really comforting to know that not everyone hates us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Speaking of, I did have Captain Damon bring his airship here. Is that stupid?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. No, that's not a bad idea. We need a better way of communicating with them. And I'm rethinking. Did you collect everything from the battle?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good. That is a discussion we should have in private downstairs. Perhaps in the morning? Bring everything downstairs and have a discussion with Cassandra and anybody we trust.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. We should sleep. You should. You look very tired.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What time of the day is it right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's getting later in the evening, close to 10pm, comparably, even though you guys woke up maybe three hours ago.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jetlag, man. It'll get you. I don't know what to do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to feel miserable for a while.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think it's a wise idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we could certainly let you sleep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We do have to start planning for the next leg of our journey.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's true, but Percy needs to go the fuck to sleep, seriously.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will admit I fear sleep at the moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How about some coffee, then?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jack him up first?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How am I physically, at the moment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The essence of the ritual and the following healing spells-- you're physically whole, but there is a very physical toll on you from the ritual as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I'm not filled with holes or anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, but you feel like a walking bruise, and every movement of your body is fraught with such physical exhaustion that you haven't felt, and only time is going to take care of that. You're effectively at minus four to any d20 rolls you make until you rest. Then it becomes a minus three, then another night's rest becomes a minus two. So you're in a rough spot for the next few days, unless you're resting consistently.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs) We do have to have a conversation about all that. We either have it now or later.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Take a fucking nap, man! We'll convene in the morning!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're outvoted, Percy. Go to bed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You literally just rose from the dead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to need new clothes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nobody wants to talk to you right now. We want you to go to sleep. We're going to go have a drink and have a fabulous time. We'll see you in the morning.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Right. I'll see you in the morning. I'm going to go up to my room and pass out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the brief moment you have consciousness as you enter the room, it is a wondrous, welcoming sight. You have just enough time to get that thought across before you facedown in your bed and right to sleep. Clothes still on, facedown from the corner of the bed. It's a terrible sight, but you don't care. The rest of you, what do you wish to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I give Pike a huge hug.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I give everybody a big hug!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, little Pike!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: With my gauntlets on, so a big bear hug!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It hurts a little, and you're proud of her for it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (growls)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I give her a fist bump with the gauntlets, and the knuckles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It actually causes this strange collision shockwave. It pushes you back a second because there's too much strength in one fistbump!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, Pike, you're getting too strong for your own good!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh man. Should we all have a drink or something?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Jarett, Shaun, can you get away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shaun goes, "For a moment, maybe. I should probably rest, as well. Jarett?" Jarett goes, "You know what? Yes. Drink sounds nice. It's been a while. Good company."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kynan, come on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm going to go join Percy's plan of action."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I walk over to Vax? So I'm assuming you're taking this little chick under your wing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I'm not taking him with us to Draconia or anywhere, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, but you're sure he's clean?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I might like to have Pike take a look at him in the morning, but I think so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's pretty spaced out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why doesn't Pike look at him now? Are you tapped, Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No. Who is this guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You recognize him, Pike, as you say that, looking at him, though much more harrowed, a little more built than you last saw him, but this is the young man who was waiting for you guys outside of Greyskull Keep a few months back, asking to join, who was bright-eyed and inexperienced.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I clocked him.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh yeah. Hi, again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hello, Pike. It's good to see you."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Good to see you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pike, do us a favor and give him a once-over. Make sure there's no funk on him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was traveling with Ripley, Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He was probably what?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was traveling with Ripley. Oh no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome back. We had a bit of a technical difficulty there, but apparently, we're back up and streaming and everything's good, so we're going to jump right back into the story where we were.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am currently holding Gilmore's severed head in my hands, right? Blood spilled, dripping--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just gouts of it, anime-style like Fist of the North Star, spraying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And Percy's dead again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Percy died, yeah. Percy died.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, he's gone. I've cried eight more times.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My bad, sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks, Vesh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're having Pike check--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So having Pike check Kynan. Kynan's looking at you, Pike. What are you going to do?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to Detect Evil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Looking over and you finish the spell, there is no sense of evil from him. Make an insight check. I'll say with advantage because of the nature of the spell, because why not? (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because you are all powerful and you can do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because he is a broken man standing before you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. 28!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't sense any evil in the sense of what the spell would gather. You do sense from looking at his expression, his reaction, and what bit of information you have, this is a person that's been heavily brainwashed, and their idea of what the world was, or as it was, has been broken, probably many times. Kynan's in a rough spot, and the guilt is weighing so heavily on him right now that it's probably best that somebody keep an eye on him.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have a lot of penance to deal with. Thank you."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You're welcome.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Maybe a drink would help."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Of course. That always helps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one that had been destroyed as part of the initial battle here in Whitestone has been constructed. The roof's still mostly missing, but they have a covering over it. It doesn't appear to be a rainy evening, so it should be fine. There's a handful of folk in there having drinks. Jarett treats you all to a round of finer ale of Whitestone brand. They don't have a large selection of rare imported drinks here, but it's enough to at least get the job done. Anything you guys want to do specifically while you're all having drinks tonight?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, Jarett! While we were in your hood, I acquired this delicious little bit. And I pull out the sandkheg bottle. This is called Seraph's Swine Swallow. And I pour a little into a glass and I hand it to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You say this is from Ank'Harel?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, and it's all in one. Hit the back of the throat and swallow it all in one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To friends?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes. To friends, and to health.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And to survival."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gives you a keen look, looks to Vex, nods. "To friends and trust."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's so worth it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I pound it, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not great. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jarett goes, (heavily slurred) "That was quite strong."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (slurred) I think so, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Slams the glass down. (slurred) "Well, I'm not going to have any conversation for a while." (laughter)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's braid each other's hair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Be a waste of your time." He became Castilian, suddenly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I get three drinks at the bar and I walk past Keyleth and leave one on the table by her and go and sit down by Kynan. I want to show you something. I bought these months ago. And I root around in my pack and I pull out the three finely made daggers that I bought.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They were expensive!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's right. They were expensive. I'm actually not going to give them to you tonight because you're worrying me a little bit, but in a day or two, these are yours. I bought these for you months ago. I looked for you. I visited the butcher shop, and I missed you. I'm very sorry about that. I wish that this had not... I wish this had not played out the way it had.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Me, too."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can atone. It is not too late. I see the look in your eye. It is not too late.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He keeps looking over at Keyleth, and you see every time he sees her, he has that spike of guilt in his heart.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. You better, motherfucker.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Be of use.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to use Luck. That is a 17.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that shows once again that I was never ready "to begin with, like you said, and I appreciate that wisdom in hindsight."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was kind of a dick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You were kind of a dick. But still. I'll do my best. I can't make any promises, "but I'll do my best."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's all any of us can do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Drink up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys share a silent drink.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I shoot him daggers whenever his eyes meet mine at one point.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he immediately goes back to his drink and takes another sip.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Maybe they can absolve me of a couple of things "on the books I would like to say goodbye to."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (slurred) I can't understand what you're saying.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (slurred) "I can't understand what I'm saying. Where did you get this?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (slurred) It is the best!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (slurred) "It's pretty great."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Pike!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike, you have to try some!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (slurred) Pike, do you want a little bit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (slurred) "You have to have some. It's not very tasty, I'll tell you that, "but let me tell you, what it will do is this."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's okay. You don't drink alcohol for the taste.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's my monster! And I pour her a little glass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Do you down the shot, Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, yeah! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a constitution saving throw!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I came to party!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll a constitution saving throw, Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh boy. Here we go.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Turn down for Pike! (singing)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was the whitest drop-in beat ever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15? Pike downs it. It burns in her stomach, and she takes it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seriously? Pike, you're such a badass!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (slurred) How do you feel, Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Throw me off another one!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I pour her another one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Make another saving throw, Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh shit. (laughs) I just rolled a one! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (slurred) "A second shot? That is obviously very brave of you, Pike."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (slurred) Yes, she's got quite the tolerance.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (garbled speech) (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no, Pike!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (slurred) Pike? Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I got too cocky.

lines.name: TRAVIS
